TORR103Text.0:
[Disclaimer] - This mod is not affiliated with Among Us or Innersloth LLC and the content contained therein is not endorsed by or otherwise sponsored by Innersloth LLC Some of the materials contained herein are the property of Innersloth LLC 

Welcome Crewmates!</size>

Our Mod Updates to Among Us v11.26s，BepInEx6.0.0-729，Reactor 2.3.1 Base onTheOtherRoles-v4.6.0

New Role - Prophet:
Prophet can search others type

We followed up with an update to TheOtherRoles to add the ability to press Shift to enter the lobby

In addition, we've added a language system to ensure that players from other countries can play our mods as usual

Finally, we have reduced the size of the dll file thanks to Fangkuai, the author of TheOtherRolesCE

Have a good game!


ELinmei-XtremeWave
TORR103Text.13:
【声明】- 本模组不隶属于 Among Us 或 Innersloth LLC 其中包含的内容未得到 Innersloth LLC 的认可或以其他方式赞助 此模组包含的部分材料是 Innersloth LLC的财产 

好久不见啦！

本次更新我们适配到了Among Us v11.26，BepInEx6.0.0 - be.729，Reactor 2.3.1  基于TheOtherRoles-v4.6.0 部分代码源自于TheOtherRolesCE-Next、TheOTherRolesGMIA、TheOtherUsEdited  在此表示感谢

新职业 - 预言家：
可以通过调查来查看他人阵营

我们跟进了TheOtherRoles的更新，添加了按Shift进入大厅的功能

此外，我们添加了语言系统，保证了其他国家的玩家可以基本正常的游玩我们的Mod

最后，我们减小了dll文件的体积，这一点要感谢TheOtherRolesCE的作者Fangkuai

尽情游玩吧！


ELinmei - XtremeWave

TORR1031Text.0:
Hello there quickly!

A little Bugs Fixed (EG:I forget)

New Role - Fraudster:
Can suicide

Add Mod Option: ShowFPS

Good Game!
TORR1031Text.13:
你好，这么快又见面了，今天有没有认真休息？

 修复了一些错误（例如：我忘了，但是不显示延迟算是吗？）

新角色 - 伪证师：
可以自杀

添加模组选项：ShowFPS

生活愉快，玩的开心！
